live_updates: Issues in the area have been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47725.summary: Some customers in the Riverside Estates and Grasswood area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47725.title: Mar 16 – Saskatoon (Riverside Estates and Grasswood)| All Services - Outage (Resolved)
